text: Jeffrey Tambor May Be Leaving'Transparent'Amid Sexual Harassment Allegations Enlarge this image toggle caption Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images Transparent star Jeffrey Tambor has announced he may be leaving the hit Amazon series after two women accused him of sexual harassment. Tambor continues to deny the allegations leveled this month by one of his co - stars on the show and by his former assistant. But the actor intimated his departure from the show, in a statement provided to NPR, due to a recent ` ` politicized atmosphere'' on the set. ` ` Playing Maura Pfefferman on'Transparent'has been one of the greatest privileges and creative experiences of my life,'' Tambor said. `
